descriptionHtml:
This is essentially a follower that is representative of the character I play with.

He can use Frost breath and is located atop the Lost Tounge Overlook.

Update: Changed the facial features to exactly match my character now; I did not know about how you could simply import the options before.

Also, if anyone knows how to create a custom voicetype that allows me to utilize a malebrute for example voice for dialogue, but also include the default voice type\'s shout sounds; I\'d very much appreciate it.
author: Endolite
